commit.message:
re PR bootstrap/26500 (info/gfortran.info is no longer being installed)

2006-03-08  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>

	PR bootstrap/26500
	* Makefile.in (dvi, html, install-info): Invoke the corresponding
	language hook targets.
	* ada/Make-lang.in, cp/Make-lang.in, objc/Make-lang.in,
	objcp/Make-lang.in: Create stub rules for dvi, html, install-info
	if language hook targets were missing.

From-SVN: r111845

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,12 @@
+2006-03-08  Paolo Bonzini  <bonzini@gnu.org>
+
+	PR bootstrap/26500
+	* Makefile.in (dvi, html, install-info): Invoke the corresponding
+	language hook targets.
+	* ada/Make-lang.in, cp/Make-lang.in, objc/Make-lang.in,
+	objcp/Make-lang.in: Create stub rules for dvi, html, install-info
+	if language hook targets were missing.
+
 2006-03-07  Zdenek Dvorak <dvorakz@suse.cz>
 
 	* tree-ssa-opfinalize.h: Removed.

@@ -3378,7 +3378,7 @@ $(htmldir)/gccint/index.html: $(TEXI_GCCINT_FILES)
 $(htmldir)/cppinternals/index.html: $(TEXI_CPPINT_FILES)
 
 dvi:: doc/gcc.dvi doc/gccint.dvi doc/gccinstall.dvi doc/cpp.dvi \
-      doc/cppinternals.dvi
+      doc/cppinternals.dvi lang.dvi
 
 doc/%.dvi: %.texi
 	$(TEXI2DVI) -I . -I $(abs_docdir) -I $(abs_docdir)/include -o $@ $<
@@ -3389,7 +3389,7 @@ doc/gccinstall.dvi: $(TEXI_GCCINSTALL_FILES)
 
 html:: $(htmldir)/cpp/index.html $(htmldir)/gcc/index.html \
        $(htmldir)/gccinstall/index.html $(htmldir)/gccint/index.html \
-       $(htmldir)/cppinternals/index.html
+       $(htmldir)/cppinternals/index.html lang.html
 
 $(htmldir)/%/index.html: %.texi
 	$(mkinstalldirs) $(@D)
@@ -3672,7 +3672,8 @@ install-info:: doc installdirs \
 	$(DESTDIR)$(infodir)/gcc.info \
 	$(DESTDIR)$(infodir)/cppinternals.info \
 	$(DESTDIR)$(infodir)/gccinstall.info \
-	$(DESTDIR)$(infodir)/gccint.info
+	$(DESTDIR)$(infodir)/gccint.info \
+	lang.install-info
 
 $(DESTDIR)$(infodir)/%.info: doc/%.info installdirs
 	rm -f $@

@@ -431,6 +431,8 @@ ada.install-info: $(DESTDIR)$(infodir)/gnat_ugn_unw.info \
 ada.dvi: doc/gnat_ugn_unw.dvi \
       doc/gnat_rm.dvi doc/gnat-style.dvi
 
+ada.html:
+
 doc/gnat_ugn_unw.dvi: doc/gnat_ugn_unw.texi $(docdir)/include/fdl.texi	\
 	$(docdir)/include/gcc-common.texi gcc-vers.texi
 	$(TEXI2DVI) -c -I $(abs_docdir)/include -o $@ $<

@@ -116,6 +116,9 @@ c++.all.cross: g++-cross$(exeext)
 c++.start.encap: g++$(exeext)
 c++.rest.encap:
 c++.info:
+c++.install-info:
+c++.dvi:
+c++.html:
 c++.srcinfo:
 c++.srcextra:

@@ -87,6 +87,9 @@ objc.all.cross:
 objc.start.encap:
 objc.rest.encap:
 objc.info:
+objc.install-info:
+objc.dvi:
+objc.html:
 objc.man:
 objc.srcinfo:
 objc.srcman:

@@ -96,6 +96,9 @@ obj-c++.all.cross:
 obj-c++.start.encap:
 obj-c++.rest.encap:
 obj-c++.info:
+obj-c++.install-info:
+obj-c++.dvi:
+obj-c++.html:
 obj-c++.srcinfo:
 obj-c++.srcextra:
 obj-c++.man:
